price: (Es ist) die Wahrheit von deinem Herrn, gehöre daher nicht zu den Zweiflern!
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takūnanna mina al-mum'tarīna
